mapper.select: SELECT id AS epoch, precise AS precise FROM model_precise

SELECT epoch AS epoch, class0 AS class0, class1 AS class1, class2 AS class2, class3 AS class3, class4 AS class4, class5 AS class5, class6 AS class6, class7 AS class7, class8 AS class8, class9 AS class9, class10 AS class10, class11 AS class11, class12 AS class12, class13 AS class13, class14 AS class14, class15 AS class15, class16 AS class16, class17 AS class17, class18 AS class18, class19 AS class19, class20 AS class20, class21 AS class21, class22 AS class22, class23 AS class23, class24 AS class24, class25 AS class25, class26 AS class26, class27 AS class27, class28 AS class28, class29 AS class29, class30 AS class30, class31 AS class31, class32 AS class32, class33 AS class33, class34 AS class34, class35 AS class35, class36 AS class36, class37 AS class37, class38 AS class38, class39 AS class39, class40 AS class40, class41 AS class41, class42 AS class42 FROM class_precise ORDER BY id LIMIT 5
